summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 11.2°C) and outside temperature (down 11.0°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 10%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 334 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), cloud levels (up 222 m), and outside humidity (down 5%) when compared to today.

Today’s cloud levels is 334.2m lower than yesterday, 217.3m lower than past week, 222.1m lower than past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 425m minimum and 1526m maximum, with an average of 618.8m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 836.0m and 840.9m.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; cold weather is expected. Also, the air will feel dry and slight breezes. A few light raindrops may fall, the sky will be mostly cloudy (or even foggy) with low clouds, and it’s dark. No significant shifts in the weather are expected.
